name: Orbimesh Document Analysis Agent
description: For WORD DOCUMENTS (DOCX, TXT, PDF) ONLY. NOT for spreadsheets - use Spreadsheet Agent for CSV/Excel. Supports Q&A, display, and Word editing.

endpoints.description: Answer questions about a document's content using RAG. Use for 'What is this document about?', 'Summarize the key points', 'Find mentions of X'. NOT for editing.

parameters.name: vector_store_path
parameters.description: Path to FAISS vector store for a single document

parameters.name: vector_store_paths
parameters.description: Paths to multiple vector stores for multi-doc analysis

endpoints.description: Display a document (PDF, DOCX, TXT) in the canvas. Use for 'Show me this document', 'Display the file'.
CREATE a new document. Can use raw content, transform an existing file, or generate from instructions using LLM. Use for 'Create a document about X', 'Write a report', 'Convert PDF to DOCX'.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Direct content for the document (optional if using reference_file_path or instruction)

parameters.name: reference_file_path
parameters.description: Path to a source file to transform (e.g., PDF, TXT) into a new document

parameters.name: instruction
parameters.description: Natural language instruction for LLM to generate or transform content (e.g., 'Create a summary report')

endpoints.description: Edit a document using natural language. Supports formatting, adding content, tables, images, headers, footers, hyperlinks, page breaks. Use for 'Make headings bold', 'Add a table', 'Change font color'.
Undo the last edit to a document. Restores previous version.
Redo a previously undone edit. Restores next version.
Get version history for a document. Shows all saved versions with timestamps and descriptions.
